Cut the courgette in half lengthways.

entry.def: Lengthways or lengthwise means in a direction or position along the length of something.

example.ex: Cut the aubergines in half lengthways...
She tore off two sections of paper towel and folded them lengthwise.
example.tran: 她撕下两格纸巾，然后纵向对折。

means.word_mean: 1. running or extending in the direction of the length of a thing;
1. in the direction of the length;
